GSD.description:
net: usb: ax88179_178a needs FLAG_SEND_ZLP

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.208 by commit f88d8c18822963d75a2b85d0ea6bb5d791dd95bf. For more details please see the references link.
